snippet.title: Dwerve - Kickstarter Trailer
snippet.description:
Support Dwerve, a new upcoming tower defense dungeon crawler RPG, on Kickstarter August 25! https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/halfhumangames/dwerve-tower-defense-dungeon-crawler-rpg

►Steam Wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1132760/Dwerve/
►Discord: https://discordapp.com/invite/halfhumangames
►Twitter https://twitter.com/intent/user?screen_name=HalfHumanGames
►Facebook https://www.facebook.com/HalfHumanGames/
►Instagram https://www.instagram.com/halfhumangames/
►Website https://dwerve.com/

Music
https://soundcloud.com/mordi-1

Voice Acting
Chelle: https://www.youtube.com/c/keeperofages
Wanderbots: https://www.youtube.com/user/wanderbots/

#pixelart #pixelarttutorial #pixelpete #kickstarter #indiegame #videogame
